active_power_1.docs:
Use the (active) power value of the channel 1 in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

active_power_2.docs:
Use the (active) power value of the channel 2 in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

current_1.docs:
Use the current value of the channel 1 in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

current_2.docs:
Use the current value of the channel 2 in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

energy_1.docs:
Use the energy counter value of the channel 1 in kWh. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

energy_2.docs:
Use the energy counter value of the channel 2 in kWh. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

energy_total.docs:
Use the energy counter value of both channels in kWh. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
Use the voltage value of the sensor in V (RMS). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [BL0939 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/bl0939.html#configuration-variables)*
